info.title: GitHub SSH Keys
info.description: This API is for retrieving lists of public SSH keys based on github usernames.

post.summary: List public SSH Keys based on username (or set of usernames)
post.description: Given a list of GitHub usernames, responds with list of public SSH keys for each User (associated to their GitHub account).

User.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.user+json; view=default

keys.description: The list of the Github user's public SSH keys.

username.description: The username of the GitHub user.

User.description: Response Type for a GitHub User's list of public SSH Keys (default view)

UserCollection.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.user+json; type=collection; view=default
UserCollection.description: UserCollection is the media type for an array of User (default view)

UserKey.title: UserKey

id.description: The ID of the public SSH key on GitHub.

UserKey.description: Type for a GitHub user's public SSH Key

code.description: an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Value of ID must be an integer

id.description: a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

meta.description: a meta object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

example.detail: Value of ID must be an integer
